Uses of Class
edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.transform.DiscreteCosineTransform

  • Packages that use DiscreteCosineTransform 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend
    Provides a set of high level classes and interfaces that are used to perform digital signal processing for speech recognition.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.transform
    Provides classes that transform data from one domain into another.

    • Uses of DiscreteCosineTransform in edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend

      protected DiscreteCosineTransform AutoCepstrum.dct
      The property specifying the DCT which will be used for creating the cepstrum.
